description: **PURCHASE OF AIRCRAFT SPARES**\\n \\nThe Department of National Defence has a requirement for the item detailed below.  The delivery is requested at the depot identified below.\\n \\nItem 1, GSIN: 5130, NSN: 5130-00-890-5503, Nut Runner \\nPart No.: 8SQ53G2, NCAGE: 4P412/65853 \\nQuantity: 5, Unit of Issue: Each, to be delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton, FCA Free Carrier. \\n \\nBidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.\\n \\n\",
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Aircraft Spare Part

#### Solicitation Number
W8485-247906/A

#### Publication Date
2023-11-21

#### Tender Closing Date and Time
2023-12-12, 14:00:00 (UTC)

#### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-12-22

#### Expected Contract End Date
TBD

#### Project Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks a supplier for the following aircraft spare part:

* Item 1: Nut Runner, Part No. 8SQ53G2, NCAGE 4P412/65853
* Quantity: 5
* Unit of Issue: Each
* Delivery Location: 7 CFSD Edmonton, FCA Free Carrier from the plant to the aforementioned depot

#### Important Details

* Suppliers who propose an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the Part Number and NCAGE number.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

#### Contact Information
If you have questions about this tender, please reach out to:
* Name: Steve Duval
* Email: [steve.duvalurbain@forces.gc.ca](mailto:steve.duvalurbain@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: 000

#### Attachment
You can download the tender document from the following link:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25266/w8485-247906---rfp-eng_0.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25266/w8485-247906---rfp-fr.pdf

#### Notice Type and Method
This is a Request for Proposal under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), with a competitive and traditional procurement method.

#### Categorization
This procurement falls under the following UNSPC codes:
* 25130000: Aircraft
* 5130: Nut Runner

Note that the original contractor shared a lot of unnecessary information. Here are the main things I removed and rephrased:

* Removed redundant information (e.g. multiple flag statements in various languages).
* Removed non-relevant details (e.g. GSIN number, NSN number).
* Removed the original contract notice, as it contained repetitive and time-sensitive information that is no longer relevant.
* Rephrased sentences
